General.Name: Tera Light Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Teralight, Ltd engages in the production of solar power in Israel. It is involved in the construction, installation, and maintenance of solar systems. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel. Tera Light Ltd is a subsidiary of Menora Mivtachim Holdings Ltd.
General.Address: Abba Hillel Silver 12, Ramat Gan, Israel, 5250606
